html:
7.24.17  6:26 am   Do you have calluses from playing too much guitar?

     'cause I do, and it feels nice to have a support network of individuals with similar experiences. :)

7.24.17  6:23 am   hey Bill, it's winter in Australia where I live rn. I was thinking that people should invent a machine to teleport users back and forth from an uncomfortably cold location to an uncomfortably  hot location so that the two opposites could cancel each other out. Saves a lot on heating and cooling devices that way.

     But then I realised that people would get plenty nauseous and their ability to function would tank to 0% efficiency so I figured I should stop thinking about such futile inventions and work on some homework instead. What do you think about such a machine?
7.24.17  5:06 am   hello are u bread
7.24.17  3:44 am   What do you think about human kind?
7.24.17  3:29 am   So I've noticed you're updating reality again, but you're doing it pretty slowly. Is there a specific schedule for reality updates or are you just doing them whenever?

7.24.17  1:10 am   what did you think about when you first started doing the reality videos?

     Were they already reality videos or were they just videos?
7.24.17  1:08 am   you can get feedback from videos in the comment section on youtube. but how do you get feedback on the no-video songs, besides emailing and the questions page?

7.23.17  11:50 pm   Do you ever feel boxed in by your audience's expectations?

     For example, do you keep making videos purely because that's what you love doing, or is it at least partially because you're now "that guy who makes videos"?

     I'm mainly curious if you've ever considered giving up YouTube to pursue making full-length music albums.

7.23.17  11:49 pm   You've said a few times that you've been playing music from a young age and you're very confident in your abilities (which you should be!). Do you ever feel or give into the temptation to "show off" in your music-whether it's a fast run, fancy chord, highly technical progression, vocal trick, or whatever

     -or do you simply put those things in when they feel "right" to you?
7.23.17  11:43 pm   have you thought about becoming a .gov instead of a .com?

7.23.17  11:37 pm   hey! have you thought about adding a "previous" and "next" links/buttons to the videos or maybe some sort of playlist thing in the reality page? it would make the navigation of the content all the more flowing, i think.
7.23.17  11:30 pm   time or space. choose
7.23.17  11:21 pm   Hi, what's the universe like? I'm considering to go and visit it.
7.23.17  10:17 pm   What is a good time?

7.23.17  10:11 pm   Hi, i was looking at your lyrics page. You use the letter e 4825 times... But you only use the letter q 19 times. What's with the disparity? Why do you hate q's so much? Maybe you can use more words containing the letter q in future lyrics?

7.23.17  10:04 pm   Did i find the questions page?

     is this it?

      i heard about it from others
7.23.17  9:34 pm   What is your opinion on Justin bieber
7.23.17  9:01 pm   do you consider "a" being 440hz, or do you think it's something different?
7.23.17  8:53 pm   I see all the capital letters you use. But it's from the questions we ask. Correct?
7.23.17  7:55 pm   what do you think of the word "aesthetic"? ... I hate it.
7.23.17  7:34 pm   Do you learn music with teachers or all by yourself?
7.23.17  7:05 pm   I just laid an egg. What should I do?
7.23.17  5:18 pm   When do you plan to have your new song out?
7.23.17  5:16 pm   is all the magic gone if you study biochemistry

7.23.17  4:55 pm   i think you should change the notebook page so it looks more like this questions page and you don't have to click the link to see each note.

      is there any particular reason why aren't you doing it?

7.23.17  4:53 pm   Do you know anything about music theory?

      And what can I learn from it?
7.23.17  4:27 pm   What's something that you think we oughta know?

7.23.17  4:24 pm   Do you think if you play enough songs in odd time signatures (5/4, 7/8, etc) that those will eventually start to feel "natural"? I know the ear/brain probably feels the most at ease when the rhythm of the song stays grouped in beats of 2,3 or 4 from start to finish. Though, can't you break down complex time signatures into combined groupings of simple beats?
7.23.17  4:12 pm   do you have a sense of humor
7.23.17  3:15 pm   Did you feel unhappy in the earlier days of your youtube career because you were incessantly working on videos but very few people watched them?

7.23.17  3:10 pm   As someone who is thrilled and committed to deadlines, I often find a conflict with working constantly and also having to repress the need to experience life and enjoy the moment. Specifically exploring the earth and connecting with others. How do you handle this with your schedule?

      On another note, I've been having problems with my ex significant other due to my schedule. He stated that I cared more about my work than him..was it terrible that I did?
7.23.17  1:47 pm   spiderman?
7.23.17  1:46 pm   what are your opinions on sliced bread?

7.23.17  1:21 pm   Have you ever considered that all of these questions are submitted by one person, and that person is an alternative  version of you with amnesia trying to re-learn everything about himself?
7.23.17  12:55 pm   please answer my questions
7.23.17  12:50 pm   do you get annoyed whenever you see an ad
7.23.17  12:49 pm   Is the secret to HoJ's success the background music you created?
7.23.17  11:19 am   Is your content a symptom of ADD or a result of being high on ADD meds? Or both?
7.23.17  11:00 am   would you recommend being born to other people
7.23.17  10:09 am   Are you actually considering putting ads on your website
7.23.17  9:16 am   Did homework in high school make you feel dead inside
7.23.17  8:24 am   why no more reality video?
7.23.17  5:48 am   why don't you sing more about pickles? and Pickling stuff ? ya pickle
7.23.17  1:27 am   do you think clouds have feelings?
7.23.17  1:19 am   bill if a genie were to grant you one wish, what would you wish for? you can't wish for more wishes.
7.23.17  12:50 am   why aren't you posting anything?
7.23.17  12:32 am   Do you actually live in a church?

7.23.17  12:31 am   Bill, would you post some occasional progress pics or short videos in order to comfort the tons of people who ask why there isn't more content coming out, and also to provide viewers with an insight on everything you do?

7.23.17  12:27 am   Clearly you must be overworking yourself, have also stopped making videos, and never use capital letters. I've confirmed it by reading these questions and nothing else. What do you have to say for yourself?
7.22.17  11:50 pm   Good pickup lines for a young goat?
